alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:04AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Delaware, eastern Susquehanna, Lackawanna, western Wayne, central Luzerne and eastern Wyoming Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 104 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Susquehanna Depot to Sheppton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Falls, Hazleton, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Carbondale and Old Forge. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87 and 87A. Interstate 80 between 256 and 273. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 223. Interstate 84 between 1 and 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Northern Wayne; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna; Wyoming
